entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
